summary: The implementation successfully delivers all 9 requirements for the Space Cafe Coffee Shop website. All sections are present with correct content, styling matches the cosmic theme specification, and the structure is well-organized. However, REQ-9 regarding image asset storage cannot be fully verified from the diff as the actual image files in frontend/public/assets/generated are not included in the file listing.

missing_requirements.requirement: Render all generated gallery and hero images as static assets in frontend/public/assets/generated directory and reference them appropriately in the React components
missing_requirements.reason: The diff does not include evidence of actual image files in the frontend/public/assets/generated directory. While components reference the correct paths (e.g., '/assets/generated/hero-cafe.dim_1920x800.png'), the actual image assets are not listed in the added files.
